item.title: EchoStar’s stock is surging. Why AT&T just struck a $23 billion spectrum deal with the company.
item.description: AT&T will look to enhance its wireless and home-internet offerings with spectrum from EchoStar.

item.title: Customers are rushing to coffee shops like Starbucks and Dunkin’ thanks to the pumpkin-spice latte ‘halo effect’
item.description: Starbucks sees foot traffic spike 24% thanks to PSLs. “It’s great just to get people in the door,” analysts say.

item.title: My aunt barely spends any money. Will we receive the contents of her safe-deposit box when she dies?
item.description: “I am asking for my mom, who is on a fixed income. It would be a nice boon.”

item.title: Cracker Barrel dumps new logo after backlash, and its stock rallies
